alert.note: Alert for Guanica; Guayanilla; Penuelas; Sabana Grande; Yauco (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 19 at 1:24AM ADT until September 19 at 9:30AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Guanica County in Puerto Rico... Guayanilla County in Puerto Rico... Penuelas County in Puerto Rico... Sabana Grande County in Puerto Rico... Yauco County in Puerto Rico... * Until 830 AM AST Monday. * At 1224 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 4 and 12 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 0.25 to 2 inches per hour. Additional rainfall amounts of 3 to 6 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of mainstem rivers including Rio Guayanilla, as well as creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...0.25-2 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Guanica; Guayanilla; Penuelas; Sabana Grande; Yauco
